page.title: 12Shopping in Aith
page.content: There is only one grocery shop in Aith. It sells a range of goods such as clothes as well as groceries. It also delivers supplies to old people who phone in their orders. Some customers have accounts and pay them monthly. There are 5 people employed in the shop. Many people go once a week for their supplies from Lerwick where prices are lower. There are a number of vans visiting the area such as the fish van and the fish and chip van. There are also mobile banks and a mobile library. Many people in the area buy goods from mail order clubs. This is because the choice is better than in the local shops and there is the option of paying over a number of weeks.
